name: Justin Beiber
description: Justin Bieber rocked an oversized Balenciaga suit at the 63rd Grammy Awards, accessorized with neon pink beanie and demonic HardCrocs.

name: Billie Eilish
description: Billie Eilish made a statement at the 2022 Grammys with a daring Rick Owens ensemble that left viewers intrigued. The outfit, a curious blend of dress and jacket, sparked conversation with its unconventional aesthetic. Paired with small-framed sunglasses, gold earrings, and sleek black shoes, her '90s-inspired hairstyle added an unexpected twist to the ensemble.

name: Ranveer Singh
description: Ranveer Singh wore this vibrant costume to the song launch event for his movie 'Jayeshbhai Jordaar,' which caught everyone's attentionâ€”but in the wrong way.

name: Tayla Parx
description: At the Grammys, singer, songwriter, and actress Tayla Parx opted for a vibrant green and yellow spiky one-piece, reminiscent of a character from a video game. While the dino-inspired ensemble didn't quite accentuate her features, it certainly ensured she stood out from the crowd.

name: Priyanka Chopra
description: Priyanka Chopra rocked a captivating silvery caged ensemble by Dior at the 2019 MET Gala, perfectly embodying the Camp: Notes on Fashion theme. Her bold choice, paired with dramatic makeup and wild curls, made for a striking and memorable look.

name: Noah Cyrus
description: Noah Cyrus wore Schiaparelli Haute Couture to the 63RD Grammy Awards

name: Elena Lenina
description: Elena Lenina's Cannes fashion is always a spectacle. In 2021, amidst a stunning black gown, her attention-grabbing braided hairstyle turned heads. Known for pushing boundaries, her bold looks often blur the line between Cannes elegance and Met Gala extravagance.

name: Doja Cat
description: 'Doja's Inferno' look, featuring 30,000 Swarovski crystals, was a testament to her dedication to style.

name: Harry Styles
description: Harry styles wore rainbow patchwork Egonlab jumpsuit covered in Swarovski crystals.

name: Pharrell Williams
description: The twist Pharrell Williams put on a classic tux for the European premiere of The Lion King certainly didn't fall short.`
